titleStmt.title: De veritate, prout distinguitur a revelatione, a verisimili, a possibili, et a falso hoc opus condidit Edoardus Baro Herbert de Cherbury ... ; et lectori cuiuis, integri & illibati iudicii dicavit.
titleStmt.author: Herbert of Cherbury, Edward Herbert, Baron, 1583-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Exc. Lutetiae Parisiorum, CI[C] I[C]C XXIV, iam denuò sed auctius & emendatius recud. Londini per Augustinum Matthaeum,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
